Types

RodSection = enum
  versionSection, configSection, stringsSection, checkSumsSection, depsSection,
  integersSection, floatsSection, exportsSection, reexportsSection,
  compilerProcsSection, trmacrosSection, convertersSection, methodsSection,
  pureEnumsSection, macroUsagesSection, topLevelSection, bodiesSection,
  symsSection, typesSection

RodFileError = enum
  ok, tooBig, ioFailure, wrongHeader, wrongSection, configMismatch,
  includeFileChanged
  Source   Edit 
RodFile = object
  f*: File
  currentSection*: RodSection
  err*: RodFileError
